content: *bring the beauty of winter indoors with a frosty blue snow crystal that will never melt * - from the blurb size 10 thread **gauge** rnds 1-4 = 1 75 in diameter this design was featured on annie s attic free pattern of the day on february 13 2008 there are no archives retained for those one-day only patterns from annie s attic 1 however you can register for free to access this pattern on the freepatterns website free-crochet link 3 1 http //www anniesattic com/free_pattern_day/index html 3 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_doilies/icy_blue_snow_crystal_doily/
